Text: This cant be real is it

Actually, it absolutely is real.  The Dolphin emulator has been working really great, especially in the last year or so of it's revisions.  Plays a large number of wii and gamecube games at near full speed with a moderately good computer.  I, for example, have a 2.4ghz core 2 duo, 4 gigs of ddr2-800mhz ram and a GTX 260 video card.  I play several games including Wind Waker for gamecube and Smash Bros: Brawl for wii flawlessly.
So, this doesn't work on win xp 32?

yes, it doesn't, you just need to get the x86 build instead
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5471766/Dolphin.NGC.Wii.Emulator.svn5251.x86-[AZkiller7]

The page btw, updates automatically as soon as a new build is released (a few times per day)
